u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr16^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I want to tell you something. I can't stand my body. It sounds incredibly small-minded, but I look at other people and I just...I end up wishing I could switch. It's not even the whole body, necessarily: I want a smile like that. I wish I had eyes like those. Muscle tone like that; hands like those. How could it be right that I was put into this dumpy thing while others got ones that are just so much...nicer? [Heshe sighs heavily.] It's just not fair.^char1AttExcl`Suave^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomAndDad04B^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I grew up not wealthy. u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotDese^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`region,Dese^txt`Did you ever have a day where you woke up and thought, **I need to move away: anywhere but here**? I did. It had been some time coming, though. Life was just starting to feel too static; too limiting. So I booked passage on the first ship I could find. It took some doing to convince the captain to take me aboard. I have no regrets, no matter what folks back in -BIO:hometown- might think.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr04^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Do you want to hear something awful? There was a shy boy where I grew up...I forget his name. But I used to bully him regularly. Call him names, even rough him up sometimes. I don't know why I did it...but I did. I was so casually cruel. I worry sometimes that that's the real me, and everything else is just a mask.^char1AttExcl`Kind^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: The enemy knows our reputation; I can sense their fear.^Oh my. Can you sense our enemies' alarm? [Meek grins wickedly.] It is...splendid.^The hour arrives; I will feast upon their fear...
u.atkBarks: This won't end well for you!^Prepare to be schooled!
u.vicBarks: ...what are all these battles doing to me?^All this unnecessary killing...^Sheesh—thank goodness that's over with. face[Sad]

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtSens1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Hello. My name is Meek Upstart. I hope you're nice. Too many people appear friendly, when in fact they don't care about you at all. It breaks my heart. [Meek wipes away a tear.]-NL--NL-Geez, Meek: too much information. [Meek snort-laughs.] Reel it in a little.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtSens2^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`[Meek mutters to himerself.] I guess I'll try my hand at this again.-NL--NL-Hi! My name is Meek Upstart. I hope you're as considerate as you seem.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspSens0^r`y^n`2^txt`[Suddenly, tears stream down Meek's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] Geez, Meek: you're not supposed to cry when you first meet people! [Heshe2 laughs.] It's -NAME-, right? I'm Meek Upstart.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grsp0^r`y^n`2^txt`Hm! I once knew someone named -NAME-. Anyway, you can call me Meek Upstart. Let's talk more later--I've got an appointment with a hot meal.^fam2`5^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspSens0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh wow! [Suddenly, tears stream down Meek's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] I'm sorry; I just realized that you're sharing things with me! As a friend! And it just made me feel really overwhelmed with feelings. It's okay; I'm fine now. Honest!^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspSensS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh, -NAME-... [Tears begin streaming down Meek's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] Ugh, -EXPL-...now I have this pit gnawing away at the base of my stomach. Stupid empathy!^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoRespSad^categoryDesc`
u.diaHobby: type`Hobby^id`hobby1^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I developed an appreciation for -HOBBY- some months back. I became aware of the way they -HOBBYTXT-... [Meek gestures dramatically.] ...I like how we can come to love things that we once took for granted.^char1AttExcl`Arrogant,Awkward,Blunt,Cheerful,Depressive,Disciplined,Empirical,Flirtatious,Friendly,Hot-tempered,Narcissistic,Paranoid,Pessimistic,Serious,Vindictive^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`14^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`Likes^categoryDesc`
u.diaLike: type`Like^id`like0^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`When I was younger, I came to like lilies. I quickly came to adore them for the way they flare out like a bursting star. They're really something that reliably makes me happy.^lifeSkillExcl`artist^char1AttExcl`Arrogant,Awkward,Blunt,Cheerful,Disciplined,Empirical,Flirtatious,Friendly,Hot-tempered,Narcissistic,Paranoid,Pessimistic,Serious,Vindictive^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`14^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`Likes^categoryDesc`
u.diaNickname: type`Nickname^id`nick01^r`n^n`2^resp`Nickname Response^txt`So...we're friends, right? I've decided to call you -CHAR2- from here on out. Not a problem, right?^min1Fam`5^char1AttExcl`Arrogant,Vindictive,Cheerful,Friendly,Jokester,Narcissistic,Serious^innerText`^nodeCategory`Nicknaming^categoryDesc`
u.diaNicknameResponse: type`Nickname Response^id`nickRespSens01^r`y^n`2^txt`You...you're giving me a nickname? Oh--I'm so happy, I think my heart might burst!^frnd1`1^frnd2`1^mor2`3^char1AttReq`Sensitive^face`Kind^innerText`^nodeCategory`Nicknaming^categoryDesc`
u.diaRecognition: type`Recognition^id`recPos0^r`y^resp`Recognition Response^n`2^txt`Char2! Well, as I live and breathe--I [i]thought[/i] that was you! What a surprise. u.diaRecognitionResponse: type`Recognition Response^id`recrspNeg0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh boy...it's -NAME-. On the same team as me. What did I do to deserve this, kick a newborn?^min1Fam`10^max1Friend`-1^frnd1`-1^frnd2`-1^face`Irritated^char1AttExcl`Hot-tempered,Vindictive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`RecognitionResp^categoryDesc`|type`Recognition Response^id`recrspPos0^r`y^n`2^txt`Okay, you know, I [i]thought[/i] I saw you, but I convinced myself it couldn't be. u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomAndDad04B^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I grew up not wealthy. I lived with my -BIO:raised by-; Mother did her best, but Father was endlessly cruel to her. She just never stood up for herself. It makes me sad and angry to even think about it.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,sad+relation,father/associatedFeeling,angry^face`Irritated^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat05BadRelationshipDadB^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`the past^txt`It took me a while to work up the nerve to tell my -BIO:raised by- that I was going to be doing this with my life. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was [i]so[/i] upset; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- said I was throwing my life away, that I was wasting my talents. But being a professor was never my life goal. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- never understood that.^lifeSkillExcl`bounty hunter,burglar,pickpocket^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,father/associatedFeeling,angry$relation,father/associatedFeeling,sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotKalkerapur01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`hometown,Kalkerapur^txt`Do you ever think about where you come from? As a place, I mean. The overall feeling of being there. I think about -BIO:hometown- more than I ever thought I would. It's strange to be somewhere so remote from what used to be my whole life.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secrMulti01^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`I've hardly told anyone this, but...I was raised by a mean drunk. Growing up, I was always frightened of doing the wrong thing, of saying something—anything—that might make him suddenly and violently angry. For a small child, it was terrifying. To survive, I learned to quiet my voice. It conditioned me that way. I sometimes wonder how I would have turned out if I hadn't grown up with that—if I would be a better person...^char1AttReq`Awkward,Imaginative,Introvert,Paranoid,Sensitive^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtBlnt0^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Psst. You. Yeah, you! [Grumbly nods hiser head.] The name's Grumbly Leader. u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspBlnt0^r`y^n`2^txt`[Grumbly looks -NAME- up and down, nodding.] -NAME-. All right. I'm Grumbly Leader. u.diaHobby: type`Hobby^id`hobbyBlntHotT02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Something I like, something I like... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...oh, I've got one: -HOBBY-. Thank goodness for Dad; to be honest, I would have been miserable if it had just been Mom and I.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,angry+relation,father/associatedFeeling,happy^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat04Sibs^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I come from a family of carpenters. We were not wealthy; it was me, my -BIO:raised by-, and my -BIO:siblings-. My -BIO:raised by- insisted that we carry on the family legacy, training us from a young age. However... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...I wasn't the eldest, and you only need so many people to run a business carpentering. I had no choice but to find another path...and this is where the path led me.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^exclBioDetail`siblings,no siblings/raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotKalkerapur01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`hometown,Kalkerapur^txt`Sometimes I think about home. Not about going back, exactly. Just the feel. The smells. The sounds. I think about -BIO:hometown- more than I ever thought I would. It used to feel like the whole world to me, but now I can see it's...a very particular place.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr12^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I generally don't mention this to people, but...I used to have an imaginary friend when I was a child: an invisible clown... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...what was its name, again? Shmee, I think? I haven't thought about this in so long! It used to make me so very happy, having a loving and devoted companion who was special only to me... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...it was all me willfully deluding myself, of course, but in some ways, that was nicer than seeing reality clear-eyed.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: For -ARMYNAME-!^We are going to win this thing, or my name isn't Upstart Leader!^Ready to roll.
u.atkBarks: You're standing in the way of victory. Time to move!^-ARMYNAME- will triumph!^-ARMYNAME- will never give up!
u.healBarks: There's only one way this ends: with you alive and our foes in panicked retreat!^Stay calm—we're going to get through this!
u.buildBarks: Done!^**Control the battlefield, and you'll control the battle.** Words to live by.
u.vicBarks: When we work together, there's nothing we can't accomplish!^See, friends: they're vulnerable. Let's end this!^The moment of their defeat is at hand!
u.defBarks: I regret only that I...couldn't do more... [Upstart collapses of hiser wounds.] face[Pained]
u.defRespBarks: [i]Noooo![/i]-NL--NL-Who did this? I'm gonna rip 'em [i]limb from limb![/i] face[Mad]
u.frnFireBarks: -EXPL-! -CHAR2-, what the heck?! face[Yell Mad]
u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtNatL1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Well met! Hope you don't mind my taking the lead here. I'm Upstart Leader. I'd love to get started. u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspNatL0^r`y^n`2^txt`We're lucky to have someone like you around. Sharing, building trust--this is the stuff strong teams are made of.^char1AttReq`Natural Leader^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspNatLS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Thank you, -NAME-. I appreciate you placing enough trust in me to tell me that. u.diaHobby: type`Hobby^id`hobby1^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I started to really enjoy -HOBBY- just a few months ago. I came to really appreciate the way they -HOBBYTXT-... u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat04Sibs^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I come from a family of toymakers. Maybe someday I'll settle down somewhere new and open a business of my own; but I'm committed to trying this, at least for now.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^exclBioDetail`siblings,no siblings/raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`

u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Just between the two of us: I am deathly afraid of dying alone. It can be a cold and lonely world out there; I've seen it. There is nothing worse in this world than dying with no one at your bed side. It sounds selfish to say it now, but... [Upstart bites the tip of his finger.] ...I hope we'll stay close friends until the end.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: The hour arrives; I will taste their fear...^Pathetic. Is this all they could scrounge up?^Ahh. Do you feel our enemies' alarm? [Apostacratus breathes deeply.] ...delicious.
u.atkBarks: Your very existence is an affront!^My condolences to your widow!^I sentence you to death!
u.healBarks: It doesn't reflect well on us, taking losses from degenerate scum. I won't stand for it!^I'll save you.
u.buildBarks: Our foes are not worthy to gaze upon my handiwork.^Here we are!
u.vicBarks: Pitiful.^Ignoramus.^Did you actually believe you could win?
u.defBarks: Defeated by...an insect like you? Impossible... [Apostacratus collapses of hiser wounds.] face[Pained]
u.frnFireBarks: -EXPL-! You [b]dare[/b] attack me?! face[Yell Mad]
u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtArro0^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Surely you are aware that ignoring one's comrades is a mark of poor breeding...but as I'm feeling magnanimous, I'll forgive the transgression. I am called Apostacratus. Charmed, I'm sure.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Irritated^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtArro1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`It seems we're now working in proximity to one another for the foreseeable future...as such, it seems to me that it would be good if you knew who I am. I am called Apostacratus.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspArro1^r`y^n`2^txt`Ah. Well. If we're to be confederates-TIC2-I suppose we might as well make one another's acquaintance. You may refer to me as Apostacratus.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grspArro0^r`y^n`2^txt`You don't say. Well-TIC2-you may refer to me as Apostacratus. And now, I take my leave of this riveting conversation.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspArro0^r`y^n`2^txt`Truly! You don't say. Well-TIC2-I've learned something new about you today. u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspArroS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Heavens. That is really rather awful. Well-TIC2-let's change to a happier subject, shall we? u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotDese^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`region,Dese^txt`Did you ever have a day where you woke up and thought, **I need to move away: anywhere but here**? It took some doing to convince the captain to take me aboard. I wonder what they'd say in -BIO:hometown- if they could see me now?^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr15^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`Here's something I don't usually tell people: I once had a child...she didn't make it past the first year. I couldn't handle the strain of it; it ended up destroying my marriage.^char1AttExcl`Cheerful,Religious^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtSens2^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`[Laina mutters to himerself.] All right...let's give it a try.-NL--NL-Hi! My name is Laina Bigspook. My name is Laina Bigspook. Maybe I shouldn't say this, but...gosh. So many people act like they're your best friend, but in truth, they only put on an act to help them get what they want. It breaks my heart. [Laina wipes away a tear.]-NL--NL-H-heh...how'd that get there?^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspSens1^r`y^n`2^txt`[Laina mutters to himer2self.] Come on, Laina. Everything worthwhile is a risk.-NL--NL-Excuse me. Yes, hi -NAME-; I'm Laina Bigspook. Forgive my gruffness; I'm still trying to reconcile what I do with who I am. We all have to believe we're good at heart.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grspSens0^r`y^n`2^txt`[Suddenly, tears stream down Laina's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] Oh boy; way to make a great first impression, right? Introductions are just a big deal to me. Meeting a whole new person; so many possibilities! I just get flooded with feelings. It's -NAME-, right? I'm Laina Bigspook.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspSens0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh wow! Honest!^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspSensS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh, -NAME-... u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamGrandmaOrGrandpa01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I never knew my parents; I was taken in and raised by my -BIO:raised by-. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was always so kind, patient, and supportive. u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhatPickpocketBurglarBountyHunter^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`You know, I used to make my living as a bounty hunter. I was just scraping by; money wasn't the issue for me. It was the unreliability of it. You might do okay one week and be out on the streets the next. I wanted to try something less risky. And now I'm a gladiator. [Laina brays with laughter.] Pretty stupid, huh?^lifeSkillReq`bounty hunter,burglar,pickpocket^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`

u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr03^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`So, do you want to hear something embarrassing? I used to wet my bed as a child. u.depBarks: Places, everyone! Best case we'll be heroes, worse case we'll still be famous. Someone will get a kick out of it!
u.atkBarks: Make it a good show, will you?^Wouldn't it be funny if...^Knock knock!
u.vicBarks: Plans fall in to place. [Heshe grins] Oh, of cCooliose, plans for a [i]fantasy[/i] show, nothing serious.^Remember this part, during Coolio retelling!^Let's give them a hand, folks.
u.defBarks: I'm just the warm up act! The rest of you, keep entertaining the audience! [Heshe laughs as heshe disappears into the background]
u.defRespBarks: -NAME-! No!-NL--NL-Who did this? I'm gonna rip 'em [i]limb from limb![/i] face[Mad]
u.frnFireBarks: -EXPL-! -CHAR2-! What did I ever do to you?! face[Yell Mad]
u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtJoke1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Say! You seem like someone who'll laugh at anything. Have you heard the one about the blind man and the priest? [Tillie guffaws at hiser own joke.]^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Tillieter^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`

u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspJoke0^r`y^n`2^txt`Whoa. Well, that's news to me! Good of you to let me know, chum.^char1AttReq`Tillieter^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspTillie0^r`y^n`2^txt`-EXPL2-, -NAME-...here we were, having some light-hearted banter, and you go and drop [i]that[/i] anvil on me. I'm...I'm really sorry you went through that.^char1AttReq`Tillieter^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoRespSad^categoryDesc`
u.diaHobby: type`Hobby^id`hobby2^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`So, I'm awfully fond of -HOBBY-. u.diaLike: type`Like^id`like1^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I developed an appreciation for rubies just a few months ago. u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat05BadRelationshipMomB^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`the past^txt`It took me a while to work up the nerve to tell my -BIO:raised by- that I was going to be doing this with my life. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was [i]so[/i] upset; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- said I was throwing my life away, that I was wasting my talents. But being a ventriloquist was never my life goal. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- never understood that.^lifeSkillExcl`bounty hunter,burglar,pickpocket^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,angry$relation,mother/associatedFeeling,sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereSmallTown02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometownSize,small^txt`I grew up in -BIO:hometown- in -BIO:region-. I can see from your face that you haven't heard of it before. It's okay. It's tiny. There's a different rhythm to life there. It's amazing here in Kalkerapur. There are as many people in one block as lived in my entire town. The anonymity is great, too. I do [i]not[/i] miss small-town gossip.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`So, do you want to hear something embarrassing? I am scared to death of chickens. I'm not joking. They terrify me. u.depBarks: Mmhmm, yes, this structure has a classic uh... [Heshe strokes hiser beard] Multi-coglomitoferocious design from ah... [He pensively humms] Sometime in the last 800 years. Yes, I think I could still break in to this. Of cCooliose, I can.
u.atkBarks: You're about to hit the book! Of which, I have read many! Hyeah!^Face the wrath of a highly qualified engineer!^Discombulate!
u.healBarks: -CHAR2-: My observations suggest that you could use a psychokinetic shield.^-CHAR2-, you seem to be in danger: a psychokinetic shield should help.
u.buildBarks: It's up to code. A very prestigious code. Better than what you're thinking.^A colossal effort, only achievable by the most splendiferous of makertitians.^A fine piece of work. [Heshe nods] Like all my work.
u.vicBarks: Everyone saw that, right? Hey, everyone!^Shouldn'ta made the Engineer mad.^A victory not only for science, but for me personally.
u.defBarks: Bwugh! Huwgh! Fine! [He storms away, periodically turning back to rant] Be that way, see how you do without my immense knowledge of first dimensional triangular catacoustics!
u.frnFireBarks: -EXPL-! -CHAR2-, what the heck?! face[Yell Mad]

u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I used to be a dancer. It went well for a few years, but when hard times hit and I couldn't make ends meet I began to think about being a great warrior! And now here I am. I guess we'll see if I made the right choice.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,professor,soldier,gambler^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotKalkerapur01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`hometown,Kalkerapur^txt`Do you ever think about where you come from? u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secrEmpir03^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`I seldom bring this up, but I don't believe in a benevolent god. Many years ago, my younger brother caught ill and died. It was...not a quick death. Tell me: what sort of cosmic, benevolent being would feel content to sit back and let an innocent child suffer and die like that? Either this being is not benevolent, or it just never existed in the first place. In any event, I refuse to worship it.^char1AttReq`Empirical^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: They think they're so tough, with their magic ice powers? I could do that too, if I... take whatever is letting them do that!
u.atkBarks: Stay out of my way, but get beneath my heel!^You [b]will[/b] respect me!^You are beneath me!
u.healBarks: Ugh. Can't you just avoid getting injured?^Ha; let's see these pathetic cretins attack through this!
u.buildBarks: Coolio foes are not worthy to gaze upon my handiwork.^That ought to do it!
u.vicBarks: [Heshe takes a deep breath, and pauses. A moment passes with fear in hiser eyes, but heshe soon shakes it off] I-I'm strong.^Take it personally, chump.^I rise!
u.defBarks: I didn't lose! [Heshe fights back tears] You all lose! I'm out of here, losers!
u.frnFireBarks: -EXPL-! -CHAR2-! What fresh incompetence is this?! face[Yell Mad]
u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtArro1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`It appears we're now working in proximity to one another going forward... [Bront strokes his eyebrows.] ...and so it seems to me that you should know my proper appellation. You may refer to me as Bront the Unbelievable.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtArro0^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Surely you are aware that ignoring one's comrades is a mark of poor breeding... u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspArro0^r`y^n`2^txt`My goodness. Well-TIC2-do let me know if you come up with any other morsels of information you wish to share.^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Mean^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspArroS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Heavens. How terrible. Well-TIC2-on the bright side, there are worse fates to suffer. Just think: you could [i]be[/i] one of the people who mistreated you! But instead, you're you: quite the upgrade, I think you'll agree.^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoRespSad^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhatSprig01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I grew up with stories of relatives who fought in the Shadow War a long time ago. I couldn't get enough of hearing about it. I guess you could say that the fight against tyranny is in my blood. I do really love being a farmer, but there are more important things, you know?^char1Race`Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereRavinale^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometown,Ravinale^txt`I was raised in -BIO:hometown-, a city-state in -BIO:region- on the coast of the Shimmering Desert. It's a huge city, and quite wealthy. A lot of folks there feel like they live in the center of the world, like everything outside of the city is unimportant. I find the attitude...unpleasant.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secrArro01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Can I tell you something? I know the others must think I'm awfully arrogant; maybe even callous. And I admit, I can be a bit... [Bront strokes his eyebrows.] ...disparaging at times. But above all else, the fact is that I am hardest of all on myself. I have very high standards for myself, and it fills me with disgust when I don't live up to them. It's all or nothing with me: I must be flawless at all times, or else I feel completely devoid of value. Do you understand?^char1AttReq`Arrogant^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamGrandmaOrGrandpa02^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`My father left when I was young. After my mother died, I was taken in and raised by my -BIO:raised by-. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- tried -NPC:hiser$,-BIO:raised by-- best, but there was always a distance between us. Deep down, I think -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- blamed me for my mother being gone. I'm grateful for what -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- did, but we've never had much of a relationship.^reqBioDetail`raised by,grandmother/raised by,grandfather^reqNPC`relation,grandmother/associatedFeeling,sad$relation,grandfather/associatedFeeling,sad^face`Sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhatGambler^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`Before I came out here, I was a gambler. I was comfortable enough; money wasn't the issue for me. The issue is that you can only win so many times before you get a reputation. Once that happens, everyone refuses to play with you. It's move on or starve. I got tired of it, to be honest.^lifeSkillReq`gambler^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereSomnus^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometown,Somnus^txt`I hail from -BIO:hometown-, the grand subterranean capital of the Shadowling Republic. There is no other place like it. I know that probably sounds arrogant, but it's true: imagine a miles-long cavern beneath the earth filled with shadowlings and distinctive shadowling architecture. It will always have a place in my heart.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr10^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I have to tell you something about myself...I was once engaged to be married. It was a mistake: I was too young, and we were a bad fit. I should have said something, but...the day before the ceremony, I fled like a damned coward. I think about it sometimes; I wonder if I even truly deserve happiness after what I did.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`
u.diaApproachFollowUp: type`Approach 2^id`appF0^r`y^n`2^txt`Hi -CHAR2-. I thought of you recently while I was practicing one of my little combat tricks; I said to myself, **I bet -CHAR2- could really use this.** And it's better to know things before you need them, yes? So. [Sooth gestures to an open space.] Shall we, then?^char1AttReq`Suave^teachSkill`1^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`10^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`2^frnd2`2^innerText`^nodeCategory`Teach^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: At your command.^When duty calls, Convinced answers!^It is time. Steel yourselves!
u.atkBarks: My patience has run out!^Don't start fights you cannot win!^Stand and face me!

u.vicBarks: You had one life...and you gave it up to benefit the oppressor.^Prognosis: grim.^And to think: you could have fought on the side of good.

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomAndDad04^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I grew up comfortable. I lived with my -BIO:raised by-; up until a certain age, anyway. Once I started to mature, Mother left us. She occasionally wrote letters, but couldn't be bothered to ever actually show up. Father was never the same after that; it was a struggle.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,angry+relation,father/associatedFeeling,sad^face`Irritated^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat05BadRelationshipMomB^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`the past^txt`It took me a while to work up the nerve to tell my -BIO:raised by- that I was going to be doing this with my life. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was [i]so[/i] upset; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- said I was throwing my life away, that I was wasting my talents. But being a doctor was [i]-NPC:hiser$,-BIO:raised by--[/i] dream, not mine. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- never understood that.^lifeSkillExcl`bounty hunter,burglar,pickpocket^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,angry$relation,mother/associatedFeeling,sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotDese^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`region,Dese^txt`Did you ever have a day where you woke up and thought, **I need to move away: anywhere but here**? I have no regrets, no matter what folks back in -BIO:hometown- might think.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr11^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Okay. This is just between you and me, but...I have a tiny doll named Dal that I carry around here, in this pouch. [Convinced coughs.] ...not that long ago.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomOrDad01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I had a carefree childhood living with my -BIO:raised by-. I could come and go as I pleased. We were just scraping by, but it didn't matter--we had each other. I miss -NPC:himer$,-BIO:raised by--.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother/raised by,father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,happy$relation,father/associatedFeeling,happy^face`Happy^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhatUniqueSailor^isUnique`true^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I left home 3 years ago to work on a merchant vessel. The sea life suited me well...until we were attacked by pirates. The captain was killed. The pirates asked me if I'd serve on their crew, but I said no. That's a lifelong commitment: you can't ever go back once you sign up with pirates. I have too much left that I want to do. No regrets there.^lifeSkillReq`sailor^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereSmallTown02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometownSize,small^txt`I hail from -BIO:hometown- in -BIO:region-. I can see from your face that you haven't heard of it before. It's okay. It's tiny. Quiet; slow paced. Moving to Kalkerapur has been incredible. There are as many people in one block as lived in my entire town. The anonymity is great, too. I do [i]not[/i] miss small-town gossip.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr17^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`So, do you want to hear something embarrassing? I was once in a relationship with someone I loved deeply. I was deeply devoted to my partner at the time, but simultaneously, I developed a pathological hatred of my partner's ex. I didn't even know them! I constantly compared myself to them in my thoughts; on a few occasions, even stalked them. No amount of reassurance from my partner could scratch the bulwark of my jealousy. Those feelings...-EXPL-. They were so intensely scary. It's like I was possessed! They make me frightened to ever really embrace love again.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

My -BIO:raised by- were traditional, and did their best to raise me with structure. It was not a happy time for me.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,sad+relation,father/associatedFeeling,sad^face`Sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat05BadRelationshipDadB^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`the past^txt`It took me a while to work up the nerve to tell my -BIO:raised by- that I was going to be doing this with my life. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was [i]so[/i] upset; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- said I was throwing my life away, that I was wasting my talents. But being a soldier was [i]-NPC:hiser$,-BIO:raised by--[/i] dream, not mine. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- never understood that.^lifeSkillExcl`bounty hunter,burglar,pickpocket^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,father/associatedFeeling,angry$relation,father/associatedFeeling,sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereSmallTown02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometownSize,small^txt`I hail from -BIO:hometown-, born and raised. I won't be offended if you haven't heard of it; it's just this sleepy little nothing place, honestly. It's tiny. Quiet; slow paced. Moving to Kalkerapur has been incredible. There are as many people in one block as lived in my entire town. The anonymity is great, too. It's suffocating having everyone know your business.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr16^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I want to tell you something. I get depressed about my body. I know it sounds really petty, but I look at other people and I just... [Fourth scratches her chin.] ...find myself overflowing with envy. It's not even the whole body, necessarily: I want a smile like that. I wish I had eyes like those. Muscle tone like that; hands like those. How is it just that I was born into this shabby corpus while others received ones that are just so much...nicer? [Heshe sighs heavily.] It's just not fair.^char1AttExcl`Suave^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamGrandmaOrGrandpa03^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`My father left when I was young. After my mother died, I was taken in and raised by my -BIO:raised by-. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was not a kind person. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- loved the idea of me, I think, but -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- could never bring -NPC:himer$,-BIO:raised by--self to acknowledge or support me as I was. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- would relentlessly criticize everything about me, and punish me cruelly if I dared complain. We haven't exchanged a single word since I left that house.^reqBioDetail`raised by,grandmother/raised by,grandfather^reqNPC`relation,grandmother/associatedFeeling,angry$relation,grandfather/associatedFeeling,angry^face`Irritated^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat04Sibs^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I come from a family of tailors. We were very poor; it was me, my -BIO:raised by-, and my -BIO:siblings-. My -BIO:raised by- insisted that we carry on the family legacy, training us from a young age. However... [Third rubs the sides of her head.] ...I wasn't the eldest, and you only need so many people to run a business tailoring. I had no choice but to find another path...and this is where the path led me.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^exclBioDetail`siblings,no siblings/raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`

It has its charms, but I needed to find someplace new and make my way in the world.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr14^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Here's something I don't usually tell people: I don't like most people: they only let you down in the end. I mean, when you're really, truly in a bad place in your life, how often does someone go out of their way to come through for you? Almost never. So I don't usually bother getting truly close to people: it's a wasted investment...but I hope that's not true with you.^char1AttExcl`Friendly,Cheerful^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtVind1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`A new contender! My friends call me First SwordEr. u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat04Sibs^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I come from a family of ventriloquists. We were poor; it was me, my -BIO:raised by-, and my -BIO:siblings-. My -BIO:raised by- insisted that we carry on the family legacy, training us from a young age. However...I wasn't the eldest, and you only need so many people to run a business ventriloquy. I had no choice but to find another path...and this is where the path led me.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^exclBioDetail`siblings,no siblings/raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotKalkerapur01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`hometown,Kalkerapur^txt`Do you ever think about where you come from? As a place, I mean. The feel. The smells. The sounds. I think about -BIO:hometown- a lot. It's strange to be somewhere so remote from what used to be my whole life.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr12^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`So, do you want to hear something embarrassing? I used to have an imaginary friend when I was a child: a purple octopus...what was his name, again? Dot, was it? I haven't thought about this in so long! It used to make me so very happy, having a loving and devoted companion who was special only to me...it was all me willfully deluding myself, of cCooliose, but in some ways, that was nicer than seeing reality clear-eyed.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: I don't know about you all, but if I must fight, then I'm going to look cool doing it. [Second offers a sly wink.]
u.atkBarks: Sorry, chap: your time's run out.^This is how it's done!^Easy does it...
u.healBarks: No need to worry yourself. [Second winks.] Hold still.^[Second winks.] Thank me later.^I'll save you.
u.buildBarks: [Second catches a coin in midair.] Thank me later.^That ought to do it!^Done!
u.vicBarks: Life goes on, right? [Second smiles.] For me, of cCooliose—not you.^Looks like you made some bad life choices.^All good things must come to an end—or in your case, bad things.
u.defBarks: Huh. Seems I...finally rolled a pair of ones. [Second collapses of hiser wounds.]

u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat04Sibs^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I come from a family of toymakers. We were not wealthy; it was me, my -BIO:raised by-, and my -BIO:siblings-. My -BIO:raised by- insisted that we carry on the family legacy, training us from a young age. However... It was for the best, though: the fighter's life turns out to be far more exciting.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^exclBioDetail`siblings,no siblings/raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotDese^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`region,Dese^txt`Did you ever have a day where you woke up and thought, **I need to move away: anywhere but here**? I did. It had been some time coming, though. Life was just starting to feel too static; too limiting. So I booked passage on the first ship I could find. It was pretty reckless, I admit: but I made it. I have no regrets, no matter what folks back in -BIO:hometown- might think.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr15^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`Okay. This is just between you and me, but...I once had a child...she didn't make it past the second year. It was one of the most difficult things I've ever had to go through; you just feel so helpless; there's this tiny being, wholly dependent on you, and you can do nothing to help them. I still think about it, at least once a day. That sort of loss never leaves you.^char1AttExcl`Cheerful,Religious^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: Oh no, bad guys! Well, that's it I guess. I've had a good run.
u.atkBarks: [Sixth mutters to himerself.] You fool--you should have run...^[Sixth mutters to himerself.] There's no way this can end well...^[Sixth mutters to himerself.] Well, here goes nothing...
u.healBarks: This won't do any good if you keep taking hits like this...^I'll protect you!^I don't know if we're going to make it at this rate...
u.buildBarks: I hope this thing holds...^I don't know how sturdy this thing is, but...there you go.
u.vicBarks: Ow, my head! I'm gonna need a drink when this is over.^I got pretty lucky there.^Huh. I guess I got lucky.
u.defBarks: I...saw this coming... [Sixth collapses of hiser wounds.]
u.defRespBarks: -NAME-!-NL--NL-Who did this? I'm gonna rip 'em [i]limb from limb![/i] face[Mad]
u.frnFireBarks: -EXPL-! That really hurt, -CHAR2-! face[Yell Mad]
u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtPess2^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Ahem. I suppose we had to do this sometime, though it likely won't end well.-NL--NL-Hello, you'll want to call me Sixth.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtPess0^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Hello, I'm Sixth HealEr. To be honest, friendships scare me. They're just a big set-up for disappointment. But...it might not be so bad if we were something partway between strangers and friends.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1AttExcl`Friendly^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspPess0^r`y^n`2^txt`Hi, good to meet you. I'm Sixth HealEr. I'll be blunt: friendships scare me. They're just a big set-up for disappointment. But...it might not be so bad if we were almost-friends.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grspPess1^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh no, not another introduction. What if you don't like me? Or worse: what if you [i]do[/i] like me and then I push you away? This is such a bad idea!-NL--NL-...ugh. Okay, okay, fine: I'm Sixth HealEr.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspRelig0^r`y^n`2^txt`Thank you for sharing that. This reminds me of a proverb we have in -BIO:religion-...but I don't want to derail your story. Perhaps another time.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`|type`Info Response^id`irspPess0^r`y^n`2^txt`Wow. Thanks for telling me. It's funny. We have no control over who we are or where we come from, but we cling to it all the same.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspPessS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Ugh. Life can be so rotten sometimes. We can only ever look backwards--try to make sense of things long after they've happened. The future...we can't see. It's terrifying.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoRespSad^categoryDesc`
u.diaHobby: type`Hobby^id`hobbyPess02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`[Sixth sighs.] Sometimes I feel like everyone is just putting on an act to hide how black-hearted they are. Only -HOBBY- will shake me out of these moods. The way they -HOBBYTXT-...it's like drinking the waters of forgetfulness.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`14^fam2`5^frnd1`1^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`Likes^categoryDesc`
u.diaLike: type`Like^id`likePess02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`[Sixth sighs.] Doesn't it ever get you down, how rotten the world is? Nothing short of rainstorms can get me out of that headspace, you know? The way they make the world smell like wet earth and grass...it just makes my whole day better.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`14^fam2`5^frnd1`1^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`Likes^categoryDesc`

u.diaRecognitionResponse: type`Recognition Response^id`recrspNeg0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh boy...it's -NAME-. On the same team as me. We'll have to set aside some time to catch up.^min1Fam`10^min1Friend`0^face`Kind^char1AttExcl`Hot-tempered,Vindictive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`RecognitionResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamGrandparents03^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`My parents died when I was young; I was taken in and raised by my -BIO:raised by-. They were not kind people. They loved the idea of me, I think, but they could never bring themselves to acknowledge or support me as I was. They used to tell me that it was my fault my parents weren't around. We haven't spoken in years, and I intend to keep it that way.^reqBioDetail`raised by,grandparents^reqNPC`relation,grandmother/associatedFeeling,angry+relation,grandfather/associatedFeeling,angry^face`Irritated^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat03SmallTown^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I was lucky: my -BIO:raised by- strongly prioritized education. Thanks to that, I ended up one of the few people in -BIO:hometown- with enough schooling to teach; so that's what I did. I taught the art and science of performing down at the schoolhouse... [Sixth rubs her hands together.] ...until one day, I just couldn't bring myself to anymore. I had to know what else was out there. I never saw myself as a fighter, but I'll try it for as long as it makes sense.^lifeSkillExcl`bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^reqBioDetail`hometownSize,small^exclBioDetail`raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereSmallTown02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometownSize,small^txt`I hail from -BIO:hometown- in -BIO:region-. I can see from your face that you haven't heard of it before. It's okay. It's small. Quiet; slow paced. It's amazing here in Kalkerapur. There are as many people in one block as lived in my entire town. The anonymity is great, too. I do [i]not[/i] miss small-town gossip.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr15^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`I generally don't talk about this, but...I once had a child...he didn't make it past the second year. It was one of the most difficult things I've ever had to go through; you give and you give, and you invest so much of yourself, and then in the blink of an eye...it's all taken away. I couldn't handle the strain of it; it ended up destroying my marriage.^char1AttExcl`Cheerful,Religious^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`
